subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: At several prominent colleges across the nation, there will be new but familiar faces patrolling the sidelines, including Bob Huggins, Kelvin Sampson and Mike Davis.
snippet: At several prominent colleges across the nation, there will be new but familiar faces patrolling the sidelines, including Bob Huggins, Kelvin Sampson and Mike Davis.
